Author: i_would_run
Text: Your story sounds like the last year of my lifeâ€”almost the same exactly story. I was fasting felt the beat I have, then stress, then BED kicked my ass. I even had to buy new clothes. That was probably the worst. People looked and me with disgust. It is only this last few weeks that I had to buy some new work clothes, did I actually come to terms with how much I fucked my body up. Getting back on track , fighting the binging, my new clothes are feeling more lose.  It motivates me to never want to feel the way that I felt this last year. Nobody should.  So much love sent your way, teammateðŸ’•
